document_data.name: Florrick
document_data.mainbody: Councilor '''Florrick''' was a city official from [[Baldur's Gate]] that served the great metropolis of the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Florrick spoke with grace and authority, simultaneously wielding flattery and generosity to elicit aid from others.
document_data.Relationships: Florrick held Grand Duke [[Ulder Ravengard]] in high esteem, and believed him to be the key to the city's salvation during its most dire times.
document_data.History: Councilor Florrick was present at [[Waukeen's Rest]] when it was assaulted by [[drow]] and [[goblin]] raiders belonging to the [[cult of the Absolute]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. She was trapped on the second floor of the inn as fires raged through the structure.
